mapper.insert: insert into smbms_provider (id, proCode, proName, proDesc, proContact, proPhone, proAddress, proFax, createdBy, creationDate, modifyDate, modifyBy) values (#{id}, #{proCode}, #{proName}, #{proDesc}, #{proContact}, #{proPhone}, #{proAddress}, #{proFax}, #{createdBy}, #{creationDate}, #{modifyDate}, #{modifyBy})
